question: The theme of the 2018 World Autism Awareness Day (WAAD) is;
option1: Empowering Women and Girls with Autism
answer: Empowering Women and Girls with Autism
explanation: The World Autism Awareness Day (WAAD) is observed every year on April 2 to recognize and support all children and adults with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD). The day is to highlight the need to help improve the quality of life of those with autism so they can lead full and meaningful lives as an integral part of society. The 2018 theme is "Empowering women and girls with autism".
